CVE-2019-10856.reason: Observing the patch, it was found that it is a python language. At the same time, Python related tags and affected libraries were found in the https://blog.jupyter.org/open-redirect-vulnerability-in-jupyter-jupyterhub-adf43583f1e4 website.

CVE-2019-10795.reason: Observed that patch is in js language, and found the npm link to the corresponding vulnerability library on the snyk website: https://www.npmjs.com/package/undefsafe

CVE-2021-29469.reason: Find the corresponding affected ecology and component names on github's security disclosure website https://github.com/redis/node-redis/security/advisories/GHSA-35q2-47q7-3pc3

CVE-2021-32641.reason: Find the corresponding affected ecology and component names on github's security disclosure website https://github.com/auth0/lock/security/advisories/GHSA-jr3j-whm4-9wwm

CVE-2017-16618.reason: In the issue website of github https://github.com/tadashi-aikawa/owlmixin/issues/12, it was found that the pypi environment and OwlMixin were affected, and the corresponding vulnerable component was found by searching for OwlMixin in pypi.

CVE-2022-30284.reason: The environment and components affected by the vulnerability were found in the external link of the NVD official website of the vulnerability, link: https://pypi.org/project/python-libnmap/
